Class CPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • CPU
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class CPU
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Created by Stephen on 2/8/16. This is the CPU class for the Jequirity Operating System.

        flag[0] = idle flag[1] = terminate queue flag[2] = unload flag[3] = loaded; a job has been loaded flag[4] = running

    • Constructor Detail

      • CPU

        public CPU(int cpuNum)
        Parameters:
        cpuNum - represents the physical core label. 0 < cpuNum < Driver.numberOfCPUs

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        public java.lang.String fetch(int programCount)
        Parameters:
        programCount - represents the index of the instruction located in the cache.
        Returns:
        Returns the Hex String representation of a cpu instruction.

      • decode

        public int decode(java.lang.String instruction)
        Converts the @param from a hex string into a 32 bit binary string. The first two bits are used to determine the type of instruction. Then using the switch statement, the function sets up the cpu according to the instruction type and the registers used. Refer to Bobbie's document on Instruction Formats for more details.
        Parameters:
        instruction - the hex string returned from fetch()
        Returns:
        the opcode for the instruction passed in
        See Also:
        fetch(int programCount)

      • executeInstruction

        public void executeInstruction(int instruction)
        Executes the @param See Bobbie's docs for Instruction Format and Instruction Set.
        Parameters:
        instruction - the opcode returned from #decode(String instruction)
        See Also:
        decode(String instruction)

                   long a)

      • read

        private java.lang.String read(int address)
        wrapper function that #load(PCB job) uses. Calculates the correct memory address that will map to the correct page in the page table.
        Parameters:
        address -
        Returns:
        the hex string in memory

      • updateMetrics

        private void updateMetrics(CPUMetrics.CPU_STATE state,
                 java.lang.String instruction)
        Function makes call that updates the gui with the most recent metric data.
        Parameters:
        state - The current state of the CPU, RUNNING, LOADING,... see enum type.
        instruction -
        See Also:

      • updateOsMetrics

        private void updateOsMetrics()
